content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates; status: NO_FUEL, warning “out of fuel”, with furnace_source containing 48 units of iron ore.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) smelting copper ore into copper plates; status: NO_INGREDIENTS, fuel inventory {'coal': 2} and furnace_result holding 6 copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) performing research "automation" with lab_input {'automation-science-pack': 10}; status: NO_POWER, electrical_id updated to 12432.
- ElectricityGroup with id=12432 connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (8.5, 6.5), and (10.5, 7.5) with voltage 0.

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(2.5, 21.5)
Consists of:
- Generator (steam engine) at position(2.5, 21.5) with connection points at positions (5.0, 21.5) and (0.0, 21.5), and neighbouring pipes at positions (3.5, 23.5), (4.5, 23.5), and (2.5, 24.5); status: NOT_CONNECTED with warnings “not connected to power network”, “no input liquid”, and “no fluid present in connections”.
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) with a fluid_box holding approximately 199.97 units of water at 15°C; status: NO_FUEL, connection points at positions (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5), steam_output at (-7.5, 24.5), and fluid_systems [46548].
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) with a fluid_box holding around 99.85 units of water at 15°C; status: WORKING, connection point (-9.5, 23.5) and fluid_systems [46548].
- Pipeline Network comprising:
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=46548 at position(-6.5, 20.5) – status: WORKING.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=46549 at position(-2.5, 20.5) – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=46550 at position(-0.5, 21.5) – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=46555 at position(-3.5, 23.5) – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=46554 at position(-7.5, 25.5) – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=46559 at position(3.5, 25.5) – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=46558 at position(2.5, 24.5) – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=46561 at position(-0.5, 28.5) – status: EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
- Pipeline Connection Failures with Incorrect Fluid System Identifiers:
  • Repeated connection attempts using fluid_system values [45860, 45903, 45946, 45989, 46032, 46075, 46118, 46161] (from earlier steps) and new attempts with [46204, 46247, 46290, 46333, 46376, 46419, 46462, 46505] all failed.
  • Tip: Dynamically retrieve and validate the active fluid system identifier from the boiler and pipeline network configuration before initiating a connection.
- Hardcoded Fluid System Assumptions:
  • Preset fluid system values without runtime validation have caused multiple aborted connection attempts.
  • Tip: Always derive the network’s fluid configuration at runtime to ensure accurate connections.
- Fuel Supply Oversight:
  • The boiler remains unfueled, hindering its operation and subsequent steam generation.
  • Tip: Replenish the boiler’s fuel inventory promptly to maintain continuous operation.
